Uses of Class
camzup.core.Gradient

Packages that use Gradient 
Package Description
camzup.core  
camzup.pfriendly  

  • Uses of Gradient in camzup.core

    Methods in camzup.core that return Gradient 
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    Gradient Gradient.append​(float scalar)
    Appends a scalar at step 1.0 .
    Gradient Gradient.append​(int color)
    Appends a color at step 1.0 .
    Gradient Gradient.append​(Color color)
    Appends a color at step 1.0 .
    Gradient Gradient.appendAll​(float... scalars)
    Appends a list of scalars to this gradient.
    Gradient Gradient.appendAll​(int... colors)
    Appends a list of color integers to this gradient.
    Gradient Gradient.appendAll​(Color... colors)
    Appends a list of colors to this gradient.
    Gradient Gradient.appendAll​(java.util.Collection<Color> colors)
    Appends a collection of colors to this gradient.
    static Gradient Gradient.clamp01​(Gradient source, Gradient target)
    Clamps all colors in a gradient to the range [0.0, 1.0] .
    Gradient Gradient.cycle​(int places)
    Cycles the steps of a color gradient.
    Gradient Gradient.distribute()
    Distributes this gradient's color keys evenly through the range [0.0, 1.0] .
    Gradient Gradient.insert​(ColorKey key)
    Inserts a color key to this gradient.
    Gradient Gradient.insertAll​(ColorKey... insertion)
    Inserts color keys to this gradient.
    static Gradient Gradient.keysByAlpha​(Gradient source, Gradient target)
    Sets the step of each color key in a gradient to the transparency of the key's color.
    static Gradient Gradient.keysByLuminance​(Gradient source, Gradient target)
    Sets the step of each color key in a gradient to the luminance of the key's color.
    static Gradient ParserGgr.load​(java.io.BufferedReader in, int samples)
    Parses a .ggr file containing a GIMP gradient.
    static Gradient ParserGgr.load​(java.lang.String fileName, int samples)
    Parses a .ggr file containing a GIMP gradient.
    static Gradient Gradient.mix​(Gradient origin, Gradient dest, int samples, float step, Gradient target)
    Mixes between two color gradients, producing a new gradient containing uniformly distributed samples.
    static Gradient Gradient.mix​(Gradient origin, Gradient dest, int samples, Gradient target)
    Mixes between two color gradients, producing a new gradient containing uniformly distributed samples.
    static Gradient Gradient.mix​(Gradient origin, Gradient dest, int samples, java.util.function.Function<java.lang.Float,​java.lang.Float> stepFunc, Color.AbstrEasing xMixer, Color.AbstrEasing yMixer, Gradient target)
    Mixes between two color gradients, producing a new gradient containing uniformly distributed samples.
    static Gradient Gradient.normalizeRange​(Gradient source, Gradient target)
    Finds the minimum and maximum RGB and alpha channels for all colors in a gradient, then maps those channels to the range [0.0, 1.0] .
    static Gradient Gradient.paletteCyanotype​(Gradient target)
    Returns a cyanotype palette, such as those used in creating blueprints, with 8 color keys.
    static Gradient Gradient.paletteLcd​(Gradient target)
    Returns a monochrome palette with 4 colors that simulates an LCD screen.
    static Gradient Gradient.paletteMagma​(Gradient target)
    Returns the Magma color palette, consisting of 16 keys.
    static Gradient Gradient.paletteRgb​(Gradient target)
    Returns seven primary and secondary colors: red, yellow, green, cyan, blue, magenta and red.
    static Gradient Gradient.paletteRyb​(Gradient target)
    Returns colors in the red yellow blue color wheel.
    static Gradient Gradient.paletteSepia​(Gradient target)
    Returns a sepia tone palette, consisting of 8 keys.
    static Gradient Gradient.paletteTemperature​(Gradient target)
    Returns a heavily stylized approximation of color temperature, where the middle key (0.5) is white at 6500 Kelvin.
    static Gradient Gradient.paletteViridis​(Gradient target)
    Returns the Viridis color palette, consisting of 16 keys.
    Gradient Gradient.prepend​(float scalar)
    Prepends a scalar at step 0.0 .
    Gradient Gradient.prepend​(int color)
    Prepends a color at step 0.0 .
    Gradient Gradient.prepend​(Color color)
    Prepends a color at step 0.0 .
    Gradient Gradient.prependAll​(float... scalars)
    Prepends a list of scalars to this gradient.
    Gradient Gradient.prependAll​(int... colors)
    Prepends a list of color integers to this gradient.
    Gradient Gradient.prependAll​(Color... colors)
    Prepends a list of colors to this gradient.
    Gradient Gradient.prependAll​(java.util.Collection<Color> colors)
    Prepends a collection of colors to this gradient.
    Gradient Gradient.reset()
    Resets this gradient to an initial state, with two color keys: clear black at 0.0 and opaque white at 1.0 .
    Gradient Gradient.reverse()
    Reverses the gradient.
    Gradient Gradient.set​(Gradient source)
    Copies data from a source gradient.
    Gradient Gradient.sort()
    Sorts the gradient according to a property of the colors in each key.
    Gradient Gradient.sort​(java.util.Comparator<Color> sorter)
    Sorts the gradient according to a property of the colors in each key.
